paper_abstract: Evaluating the impact of applications with significant operating-system interactions requires detailed microarchitectural simulation combined with system-level simulation. A cost-effective and practical approach is to combine two widely used simulators. simwattch integrates simics, a system-level tool, with wattch, a user-level tool, to facilitate analysis of a wider design space for computer architects and system developers.
paper_title: Simwattch: Integrating complete-system and user-level performance and power simulators
